title: S4 Ep29: A cure for Friday morning fever
itunes:title: A cure for Friday morning fever
description: People everywhere sometimes pretend to be sick on a Friday because a day off work means a three-day weekend. In Italy, sick workers may now get a surprise home visit from the doctor. Tito Boeri tells Tim Phillips how effective this has been as a cure for "Friday morning fever".
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
